Question: What will you put on a pen to prevent it from drying out?
Options: A. write sentences on paper B. ink in C. ink cartridges D. caps E. cling film

Option B is correct because putting ink in the pen will prevent it from drying out. Ink contains the necessary moisture for the pen to write smoothly and without cracking. Writing sentences on paper, caps or cling film do not prevent the pen from drying out and would only make it harder to write. Ink cartridges are also a good option because they provide a constant supply of ink to the pen, preventing it from drying out.
